summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LifeTiles Sync app. Backend APIs working well (78.3% success rate) with functional alcohol database (105 drinks), AI nutrition analysis, and dashboard metrics. Frontend loads correctly with proper design and auth flow. Critical modal overlay issue prevents full tracker testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 status code for successful creation
Cross-midnight sleep calculation bug: 23:00 to 07:00 calculates as -16 hours instead of +8 hours
minor_bugs.impact: Incorrect sleep debt calculations for overnight sleep

working_endpoints: AI nutrition analysis with Gemini 3 Flash

critical_bugs.issue: Modal overlay not closing properly with Escape key, blocking all subsequent interactions
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents testing other tracker modals and user menu interactions

integration_issues.issue: After opening alcohol tracker, invisible overlay blocks clicks on other elements

issues: Chart width/height warnings in console (Recharts library)

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Sign in with Google button
API root endpoint returns correct message
All category endpoints working (drinks, spending, exercise)
Auth system with test user creation and session management
Dashboard loads with calendar and completion ring
All 5 tracker cards present and visible
AI nutrition analysis working with Gemini 3 Flash
Responsive design working (desktop, tablet, mobile viewports)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical modal overlay issue: tracker modals not closing properly with Escape key, leaving invisible overlay that blocks all subsequent user interactions. Also fix sleep calculation bug for cross-midnight sleep times.
success_percentage: Backend: 78.3% (18/23 tests passed), Frontend: 60% (alcohol modal works, others blocked by overlay)
